HEADER.Value: Lenten Theotokion for Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday

TEXT.Value: As thou art a well-spring of compassion, vouchsafe mercy unto us, O Theotokos. Look upon a sinful people; show forth, as always, thy power. For hoping in thee we cry “Rejoice!” to thee, as once did Gabriel, the Supreme Commander of the Bodiless Hosts.
